titleStmt.title: A declaration of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament to the whole kingdome, concerning the excise: with additionall instructions for the better regulating of the same. Die Lun√¶ 22 Feb. 1646. Ordered by the Lords assembled in Parliament, that this declaration and instruction be forthwith printed and published. Io. Brown, Cler. Parliam.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Wright, at the Kings head in the Old-baily.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
